name: Snapped
overview: The fascinating cases of every day, seemingly average moms, wives and girlfriends accused of murder. Did they really do it? And if so, why?

episodes.name: Celeste Beard Johnson
episodes.overview: In 1997, the frustrated wife of a multi-millionaire convinced her lesbian lover to kill her husband. Her fatal mistake was instead of embracing here partner in crime she ditched the Sapphic spouse slayer soon after the crime.

episodes.name: Virginia Larzelere
episodes.overview: Virginia Larzelere's husband Norman was a successful Daytona Beach dentist, and they enjoyed a beautiful home, expensive cars, a yacht, and an airplane. But the good times came to an abrupt end on March 8, 1991, when a masked gunman broke into Norman's office and killed him with a shotgun blast to the chest.

episodes.name: Clara Harris
episodes.overview: Few smiles were brighter than those of two married dentists, who shared a thriving practice and a seemingly perfect marriage. But that changed in July of 2003,  when the wife began to suspect her husband was having an affair with his secretary.

episodes.name: Elena Kiejliches
episodes.overview: Russian émigré Elena Kiejliches was living the American dream. At 36, she had two children, a millionaire husband, and a sprawling mansion in Staten Island's upscale Toldt Hill neighborhood. But Elena's fairytale life came crashing down in March 2000, when her husband, Borys, went missing.

episodes.name: Kimberly Hricko
episodes.overview: A bright and bubbly surgical technician led a comfortable middle-class existence with her husband. But this sunny, suburban image vanished in smoke and flame on Valentine's weekend of 1998 when they went on a romantic  getaway meant to rekindle their marriage, at a golf resort on Maryland's Eastern Shore.

episodes.name: Lee Ann Reidel
episodes.overview: A woman who always had a thing for hunky men married a Long Island gym owner in 1998, and everyone thought it was the perfect match. She just had one small problem with her new husband - his crack cocaine addiction.

episodes.name: Ruth Ann Aron
episodes.overview: An over-achieving real estate developer and aspiring politician was the wife of a respected urologist in the upscale D.C. suburb of Potomac, MD. In 1994, she made a run to be the Republican nominee for the U.S. Senate, but lost, partly due to a local attorney who dogged the campaign with allegations of shady business deals. Soon after, her husband and the local attorney are murdered.

episodes.name: Joyce Cohen
episodes.overview: A 24-year-old young woman went from rags to riches when she met and married a Miami construction millionaire in 1981. Together, the couple lived lavishly in an exclusive Coconut Grove mansion, went skiing at their Steamboat Springs ranch, and partied all night long at Stan's Miami nightclub. Then one night, the pampered trophy wife's husband is killed in a home invasion robbery.

episodes.name: Susan Wright
episodes.overview: A middle-class Houston housewife married to a successful salesman, was a stay-at-home mom raising two adorable young children in their suburban home. But then, in January of 2003, he mysteriously disappeared.

episodes.name: Diane Zamora
episodes.overview: Engaged high school sweethearts met in 1991 as volunteers in the Texas Civil Air Patrol. She was an honor roll student bound for Annapolis, and he was a track star with an appointment to the Air Force Academy. This former Navy cadet was just 19 when she learned he had cheated on her. Her rival ends up dead but who did it?

episodes.name: Kristin Rossum
episodes.overview: A spunky and ambitious toxicologist at the San Diego medical examiner's office was a summa cum laude graduate of San Diego State University. Her husband worked for an up-and-coming biotech firm. Well-educated, highly intelligent, and good-looking, their future seemed limitless. So why did the husband commit suicide, or did he?

episodes.name: Debra Baker
episodes.overview: The female bookkeeper and business manager of a millionaire Texan entrepreneur was also a close confidant of his wife. They were so close that he, and others, began to suspect that the pair were more than just friends. Then, the entrepreneur husband was poisoned.

episodes.name: Carolyn Warmus
episodes.overview: A millionaire heiress landed a job teaching computer science where she met and began an illicit affair with a popular sixth grade teacher. Then, the married man's wife was murdered, but who committed such a brutal act?

episodes.name: Betty and Peggy
episodes.overview: Did twin sisters Peggy Lowe and Betty Wilson hire a hit man to kill Betty's husband, Dr. Jack Wilson? Could the hit man's testimony be believed?

episodes.name: Adele Craven
episodes.overview: They were the perfect suburban couple. She was a trained mortician; he was a high-flying Delta Airlines pilot with a sky-high salary. They had a beautiful home in upscale Covington, KY, and two young sons. However, when he was away with work, she was having an affair. When her husband was found dead in their basement, she was the prime suspect. But was the churchgoing housewife really capable of murder?

episodes.name: Rita Gluzman
episodes.overview: A woman spent years campaigning for her husband, a brilliant scientist, to be allowed to leave the Soviet Union and, eventually, they were able to live freely together in the US. However, in April 1996, police discover garbage bags full of the husband's body parts being thrown into the Passaic River in New Jersey. His wife is the prime suspect for the crime.

episodes.name: Sharee Miller
episodes.overview: When a Michigan salvage magnate was shot dead, police suspected a robbery gone bad; however, the investigation begins to indicate that all may not be as it seems, and soon the evidence leads the police to an internet chat room.

episodes.name: Elisa McNabney
episodes.overview: The body of a successful attorney is discovered lying in a shallow grave in a Sacramento winery, his wife Elisa is suspected of the crime. Before police can interview his wife, she flees the scene and commits suicide. Did guilt drive her to death?

episodes.name: Teri Gilbert
episodes.overview: An Albuquerque County Commissioner is shot in his own basement after being mistaken for an intruder by his wife. It was an open and shut case until investigators discovered that her first husband met a very similar fate.

episodes.name: Donna Sommerville
episodes.overview: In November 2001, a wealthy Virginian farmer, heir to the DuPont farms, died in his bed and authorities assumed he had a heart attack, but an autopsy revealed massive amounts of drugs. Did his wife, a hospice nurse, kill him?

episodes.name: Brenda Andrew
episodes.overview: After a husband was shot dead in their driveway, his wife, an Oklahoma City Baptist Sunday school teacher, was a grieving widow. Soon, an illicit affair with an insurance salesman and an insurance scam are uncovered.

episodes.name: Stephanie Stephens
episodes.overview: A former beauty queen is married to an older, wealthy heart surgeon. In May 2001, she wakes up next to her dead husband's body and becomes the prime suspect. Did she administer the lethal cocktail of drugs, etomidate and atricurium, that killed her husband?

episodes.name: Amy DeChant
episodes.overview: A sexy little Las Vegas siren with a taste for rich men snares a wealthy sports bookie. When a Las Vegas bookie went missing, his pretty girlfriend claimed he was in trouble with the mob. However, when his body is found in the desert, police believe that his girlfriend may have had a hand in both his death and his wallet.

episodes.name: Linda Jones
episodes.overview: On the evening of November 7, 1995, three men broke into the home of a married couple. They tied up the wife and while she watched helplessly, the thugs beat her husband to death with a bat. Police believed that the brutal beating and murder was a robbery gone wrong, but when one of the attackers was caught an even darker picture emerged.

episodes.name: Dionne Baugh
episodes.overview: A cheating wife is carrying on an illicit affair with her multi-millionaire boyfriend. He's later found with his head bashed in.

episodes.name: Dante Britteon Sutorius
episodes.overview: A petite, vivacious woman lived an unusual life having been married and divorced four times. She met her fifth husband, a recently divorced rich doctor, through a dating service. He thought she was what he needed and that he had a second chance at marital bliss. So, no one believed that he would commit suicide.

episodes.name: Pamela Smart
episodes.overview: A 22-year-old teacher has a devoted husband and a good job. Though she had ambitions of being on television, she enjoyed working with teenagers as the media director at Winnacunnet High School in Hampton, NH. Then, in May of 1990, her life takes a tragic turn when she returns home to find her husband shot to death. Police suspect a robbery until a tip off reveals an alleged affair.

episodes.name: Donna Yaklich
episodes.overview: A 31-year-old woman is married to a Pueblo CO, narcotics detective, while raising a son and four stepchildren on the family's farm. One December evening in 1985, shots rang out and her husband is killed. Suspicion immediately falls on the criminals was investigating. However, when the police learn of his troubled home life, they begin to suspect that the murderer may be closer to home.

episodes.name: Yesenia Patino
episodes.overview: An exotic 34-year-old brunette was living very comfortably thanks to her generous, and married, lover. In February of 1991, the married lover's wealthy wife was brutally murdered while on vacation in Mexico. Arizona authorities opened their own investigation, suspicious of her husband and his mistress. (also shown as S7:E33, S8:E3)

episodes.name: Manuela Garcia
episodes.overview: A German woman fell in love with an American serviceman; they married and moved to Colorado. After 15 years of marriage, the mother of three wanted to return home. Instead, in July of 1996, she hacked her husband to death with an axe, but was she acting in self defense?

episodes.name: Jeena Han
episodes.overview: Native South Korean identical twin sisters overcame a difficult childhood to become co-valedictorians in high school. They both seemed headed for success until, at 23, one of them developed a gambling habit and began stealing and forging checks to pay her debts. When she needed help, her twin sister took her in, even though they had a love/hate relationship. Their sibling rivalry would eventually escalate to burglary, identity theft and murder.

episodes.name: Dora Cisneros
episodes.overview: A doctor's wife and mother of five led an ordinary suburban life in Brownsville, TX. She lavished attention on her youngest daughter. In 1993, that youngest daughter was dumped by her high school sweetheart. When he was later found dead, who was guilty of murder?

episodes.name: Kimberley Kondejewski
episodes.overview: A meek woman married her high school sweetheart, a Canadian Army instructor. He soon became an abusive, controlling husband. After two children and 17 years of abuse, he told her to commit suicide, so he could get rich, or he would kill her and their children. On May 14th, he was dead.

episodes.name: Mary Thompson
episodes.overview: She crusaded against gangs and helped police gain convictions, and became a prominent and celebrated local hero in the Eugene community. She was outspoken about her son's struggle to stay out of gangs and about the dangers other children in the community faced. She even teamed up with a popular high school senior to educate other students on gang violence. But when that student was executed in his home, police began to suspect that Mary wasn't leveling with them. They soon reveal a much darker side.

episodes.name: Laura Rogers
episodes.overview: When a divorced woman married for the second time, she thought she'd be happy; however, her new husband turned out to be controlling and abusive. He used his contracting work to move the family often and isolate them from friends and relatives. Then, in April of 2004, her husband was killed by a single shotgun blast and she claimed it was suicide.

episodes.name: Linda Lou Charbonneau
episodes.overview: A woman was with her partner of 20 years before leaving him for his young nephew. In September 2001, her ex was found dead. Just a few weeks later in October, her husband is also dead.  Was she a Black Widow, or an unwitting dupe?

episodes.name: Stella Nickell
episodes.overview: A wife was settled into a comfortable life with her husband, living together in a trailer on a few acres with a view of Washington's Mt. Rainer. Then, in June of 1986, her husband dropped dead on the deck of the trailer. Though doctors said it was emphysema, she swore it was the Excedrin he'd taken just moments before his collapse.

episodes.name: Kim Anderson
episodes.overview: As a blonde, beautiful and ambitious woman, she never had any trouble finding success or successful men. In fact, by the time she was 34, she had been married to two of them, and had given birth to two children by each. Her second husband was a successful divorce attorney from the nearby town of Celina. Shortly after the birth of her fourth child, her marriage began to falter and they started going through a divorce. When it turned nasty, she shot her husband. Pleading self-defence, she was acquitted in court, but the dead man's family wasn't satisfied.

episodes.name: Gail Bennett
episodes.overview: Raised on a Texas farm, a young woman spent her childhood taking care of her siblings. When she left home, she began a string of bad marriages and by 1990, she was filing for her third divorce. With one daughter grown, and a son living with her second ex-husband, she was at a crossroads in her life. That's when ex-husband number three convinced her to come back to him. She was a battered hhousewife and eventually she shot and wounded her violent spouse. Instead of protecting her, the local sheriff raped her. Then, she filed a civil suit to fight for justice.

episodes.name: Deidra Lane
episodes.overview: As the wife of a successful football star and mother of two, she seemed to lead a charmed life. But when she shot her husband dead at point-blank range, she pleaded self-defense. She claims that abuse is what caused her to shoot her husband, but police find that years earlier she had committed the crime of larceny.

episodes.name: Sandy Murphy
episodes.overview: A woman seemed to have hit the jackpot when she started dating wealthy casino heir Ted Binion. But, her luck took a turn for the worse when Binion was found dead in his home, and she became a key suspect.

episodes.name: Carol Carr
episodes.overview: A desperate wife and mother watched her husband suffer for years from Huntington's disease, but when her son fell ill, she was compelled to take drastic action.

episodes.name: Erin Dukes
episodes.overview: A battered housewife knew she had to escape her brutal spouse for the sake of her children. However, her husband refused to let her go and she had to fight for her freedom. She stands up and tries to end the reign of her abusive husband.

episodes.name: Donna Fryman
episodes.overview: She shot her husband three times after their business collapsed and he embarked on an affair, but would a jury believe her claim of self-defense?

episodes.name: Dixie Shanahan
episodes.overview: In 2002, a quiet Iowa housewife shot her abusive husband in their bedroom, then left the room and shut the door. It stayed shut for more than a year before authorities became suspicious of his disappearance. When police finally discovered the body, they learned the truth behind a terrible crime and an unlikely killer.

episodes.name: Sheila Davalloo
episodes.overview: It started out as fun and games when a woman and her husband played "guess what I'm touching you with" while he was handcuffed and blindfolded. But, the fun ended when she touched her husband with the blade of a knife.

episodes.name: Phyllis Nelson
episodes.overview: An Iowa woman confronted her estranged husband about his affair. The heated argument ended with her husband being stabbed to death.

episodes.name: Nikki Redmond
episodes.overview: The former reigning Miss Savannah fatally shot her boyfriend after tracking him to his fiancée's house. However, she claimed that she was defending herself after he went for his gun.

episodes.name: Piper Roundtree
episodes.overview: A mother lost custody of her children and the bulk of her marital assets in a bitter divorce. Her ex-husband, a college professor, was fatally shot in his driveway in October of 2004.

episodes.name: Mary Ellen Samuels
episodes.overview: Just when a woman finds herself on the verge of a messy divorce, her husband turned up dead. The investigation that followed would reveal a bewildering conspiracy that revealed hitmen hired to kill the hitmen who had murdered her husband.

episodes.name: Melinda Raisch
episodes.overview: A widow was able to successfully rebuild her life after her first husband was brutally killed during a home robbery. Two decades later; however, the soccer mom faced further questioning over what really happened that fateful day.

episodes.name: Sarah Johnson
episodes.overview: When a rebellious 16-year-old girl snuck out to spend the night with her older boyfriend, her parents grounded her. Then, her parents were found brutally murdered. Did teenage angst take a deadly turn?

episodes.name: Joan Shannon
episodes.overview: When Joan Shannon's soldier husband was shot to death by her teenaged daughter, it didn't take long before authorities suspected that she may have played a role in the demise of her well-insured spouse.

episodes.name: Michelle Theer
episodes.overview: When her Air Force Captain husband was shot dead, investigators blamed Michelle's lover, but when they tried to arrest the widow for conspiracy, she had vanished.

episodes.name: Martha Freeman
episodes.overview: A Tennessee woman led a seemingly normal life in an upscale Brentwood neighborhood. She was married and had started a successful business. But, her relationship with her husband was troubled. It wasn't long before her depression and an affair put murder on the agenda.

episodes.name: Amy Bosley
episodes.overview: A married couple were making a name for themselves with a successful roofing and chimney sweep business in their small Kentucky community. The wife was the bookkeeper for the family business and was behind on taxes. But, tragedy struck on the night of May 17, 2005, when her husband turns up dead before he can learn about her secret.

episodes.name: Kimberly Cunningham
episodes.overview: She had known her sister's longtime boyfriend for 18 years and trusted him. He was practically an uncle to her three children and often had them over to his home. He was the farthest thing from her mind when she tried to discover why her 16-year-old daughter was depressed. Then she found out he was abusing her children...

episodes.name: Margaret Rudin
episodes.overview: In 1987, a four-time divorcee married a Las Vegas real-estate mogul. With his $11 million dollar fortune to draw from, she was thrilled to be able to pursue her passion for buying and selling antique furniture. By 1994, however, his penchant for women and alcohol had put some serious cracks in their once rock-solid marriage and would lead to a sticky end.

episodes.name: Jane Dorotik
episodes.overview: A successful healthcare executive's marriage had hit the rocks. In February 2000, after years of marital turmoil, her husband was discovered beaten and stabbed to death.

episodes.name: Susan Polk
episodes.overview: When a 15-year-old girl's parents sent her to a respected therapist, they had no way of seeing the future. Less than a year after her therapy began, the middle-aged psychologist had fallen in love with his young patient. Their relationship blossomed into marriage and children, but their feuds would lead to murder.

episodes.name: Vicki Monroe
episodes.overview: Life was good for popular Louisville, KY, bar owners and they seemed like a close couple to their customers. But, their long days working together would result in murder when he turned up dead and her son blamed her for the crime.

episodes.name: Claire Welsh
episodes.overview: A former prom queen was the all American girl, but she could not seem to master her personal life. Was it a case of 'fatal' attraction when she started dating her lover?

episodes.name: Mary Krueger
episodes.overview: An Iowa couple's marriage was less than idyllic. She caught her husband with a prostitute in the kitchen of their farmhouse, and she had a rifle in her hand when she made the discovery.

episodes.name: Brookey Lee West
episodes.overview: A Las Vegas woman ended years of mother-daughter conflict when she put her unstable mother away. But, she had new problems when police discovered where she had put her mother.

episodes.name: Daphne Wright
episodes.overview: A deaf lesbian lived a hard life in the conservative Midwest. In February of 2006, her romantic rival was murdered and she found herself being questioned about committing the crime.

episodes.name: Melanie McGuire
episodes.overview: In May 2004, a nurse told friends that her husband of five years had walked out on her. Days later his dismembered body washed up on the shore of Chesapeake Bay.

episodes.name: Mary Winkler
episodes.overview: A preacher's wife finds a sinful solution to a financial crisis and a troubled marriage.

episodes.name: Jessica McCord
episodes.overview: A mom spent seven years fighting her ex-husband over custody of their two daughters, until she convinced her new husband to end the custody battle with a bullet.

episodes.name: Adrienne Hickson
episodes.overview: A possessive student was looking forward to a career in criminal law, but a spat with her boyfriend would see her as a defendant, not an attorney.

episodes.name: Sarah Brady
episodes.overview: How could a confrontation about a baby registration mix up lead to a violent altercation, and ultimately murder, between two expectant mothers?

episodes.name: Elizabeth Reynolds
episodes.overview: A jealous woman spent thousands on cosmetic surgery to please her lover. After she discovered he was cheating on her, she spent a thousand more to end it.

episodes.name: Lynn Turner
episodes.overview: She was a keen cook, but when her boyfriend died suddenly, just like her husband years before, her special cooking ingredient was uncovered.

episodes.name: Kathleen Denson
episodes.overview: A wealthy female ranch owner's life of money, sex and drugs came to a halt when her boyfriend was shot.

episodes.name: Misty Witherspoon
episodes.overview: When a woman's policeman husband was found shot dead, it appeared to be nothing more than a tragic accident. But was the grieving widow really all she seemed?

episodes.name: Cynthia George
episodes.overview: A former beauty queen and socialite would regularly make the society columns. But after a gruesome 2001 murder, she made headlines for all the wrong reasons.

episodes.name: Lisa Whedbee
episodes.overview: The chilling tale of a frustrated wife and overworked mother who thought that by murdering her husband, she could finally be free. She was sadly mistaken.

episodes.name: Erica Sifrit
episodes.overview: Discover how a selection of hidden mementos exposed a happily married businesswoman as the cold-blooded killer of a local couple who had mysteriously disappeared.

episodes.name: Malaika Griffin
episodes.overview: A gifted chemist who worked in a biotech lab had a past she wouldn't talk about - one that included a dangerous secret and a motive for murder.

episodes.name: Sharon Daniels
episodes.overview: A school teacher had been a patient woman, but her patience wore thin when her husband started abusing her. She turned to the police and later a more permanent solution to solve her problems.

episodes.name: Michelle Michael
episodes.overview: Bored with her job and her marriage, a nurse gives her husband a lethal injection and sets the house on fire in an attempt to collect the insurance.

episodes.name: Linda Henning
episodes.overview: A designer fell under the spell of a conman and was later charged with his wife's murder. Did she kill? Discover a bizarre case involving aliens and brainwashing.

episodes.name: Darlene Gentry
episodes.overview: Marriage and kids didn't stop their mom from drinking and dancing. When money troubles threaten her fun, she realizes how to get more.

episodes.name: Monique Berkley
episodes.overview: A look at the crimes of a wife and mother who masterminded the shooting of her husband with the help of her alleged teenage lover and her stepdaughter's boyfriend.

episodes.name: Shayne Lovera
episodes.overview: With the help of her lover, a cheating wife allegedly bludgeoned her husband to death and staged his murder as an accident. But was love the motive... or money?

episodes.name: Ann Trexler
episodes.overview: A grandmother moved to Florida to spend more time with her granddaughter. When the girl's father decided to move her to Montana, she brings the relocation plan to a dead stop.

episodes.name: Kerri Fae Brown
episodes.overview: When a nursing home administrator was on the verge of being sacked for cooking books, she laid her hands on a gun and did some firing of her own.

episodes.name: Ann Miller Kontz
episodes.overview: When an unfaithful chemist wanted out of her marriage, she preferred arsenic to divorce proceedings, embroiling her lover in her deadly scheme.

episodes.name: Elicia Hughes
episodes.overview: When a teacher's husband leaves for a night out, his lover and his wife wait up for his return, having already prepared a deadly lesson.

episodes.name: Linda Fields
episodes.overview: When a ranch hand's body is found in a river, the police have little to go on, until a money trail leads them to a a married couple and a grim truth is revealed.

episodes.name: Tracey Frame
episodes.overview: When a dating couple engaged in a property dispute, the consequences became deadly. After a bitter break-up, there was yet another deadly result.

episodes.name: Shawna Nelson
episodes.overview: When her long-term lover refused to end his marriage, she drove to his wife's office and waited for her love rival outside ending in a deadly outcome.

episodes.name: Jeanette Sliwinski
episodes.overview: On the morning of July 14, 2005, a young Illinois woman drove through her town at 90 mph, killing three men. What caused this pretty student to act so recklessly?

episodes.name: Leslie MacKool
episodes.overview: When a woman finds out her father leaves her little cash in his will, she's prepared to get her hands on the family fortune.

episodes.name: Ashley Humphrey
episodes.overview: A teen bride gave her husband, a personal trainer, exactly what he wanted as a wedding gift. In July 2003, a Florida woman, who had charged that same personal trainer with assault, was found shot to death.

episodes.name: Larissa Schuster
episodes.overview: In July 2003, a father, soon-to-be divorced from his estranged biochemist wife, fails to turn up for work. Police find his keys, wallet, phone and then body floating in tank of acid. What caused his killer to snap?

episodes.name: Cindy Sommer
episodes.overview: When a seemingly fit and healthy  married Marine drops dead, doctors believe it was a tragic accident. But when a second test reveals arsenic in his system, foul play is suspected.

episodes.name: Mechele Linehan
episodes.overview: A cold case involving an ex-stripper heats up when investigators revisit the 1996 shooting death of a commercial fisherman in Alaska.

episodes.name: Beth Carpenter
episodes.overview: Investigators link the 1994 death of an odd job man to a highly respected lawyer, a fierce custody battle for a young child and a determined aunt.

episodes.name: Monique Johnson
episodes.overview: When a policeman is murdered in September 2006, investigators are quick to arrest his troubled girlfriend, a deputy jailer. Was it cold-blooded murder? Or can she prove she killed him in self defense?

episodes.name: Susan Grund
episodes.overview: When a  prominent district attorney is found dead on his sofa, a family realizes that loyalty means nothing, but will the right person pay for the crime?

episodes.name: Lisa Costello
episodes.overview: When a businessman went missing in 1996, a business rivalry was revealed and, subsequently, the grisly truth.

episodes.name: Jocelyn Dooley
episodes.overview: Police investigate the execution-style murder of a popular casino employee who was just a signature away from divorcing his wife.

episodes.name: Renee Poole
episodes.overview: An anniversary celebration turns tragic when a young husband is gunned down during what appears to be a beach-front robbery but proves to be so much more. An alleged affair comes to light.

episodes.name: Nikki Reynolds
episodes.overview: Just after her dad had left for church, a teenager called the police and confessed to a murder. When the cops arrived, they found her mother, violently stabbed to death. Did she do it?

episodes.name: Jennifer Hyatte
episodes.overview: A prison nurse fell for an inmate. Eventually, she loses her job and they get married. Faced with a life apart, she frees her inmate husband by helping him escape when he is transported from court, resulting in violence and murder.

episodes.name: Rhonda Orr
episodes.overview: A woman's neighbors tried to help her and her husband when a fire started - but this fire was no accident. A criminal investigation is started.

episodes.name: Erin McLean
episodes.overview: When a married teacher's student lover moves into the home she shares with her husband, a deadly love triangle is formed that leads to an emotionally driven murder.

episodes.name: Shannon Torrez
episodes.overview: In a shocking case in Missouri, a mother is left for dead and her baby stolen when she does the kindly thing and lets an unknown woman into her house to use the telephone.

episodes.name: Monique Turrene
episodes.overview: After a married Canadian Air Force Major is found mysteriously slain in his driveway, police uncover a secret affair that could have led to his permanent grounding.

episodes.name: Kelly Forbes
episodes.overview: A couples' honeymoon period came to an abrupt end when, after just two months of marriage, the recent groom was found strangled in their New York home.

episodes.name: Michelle Michael (updated)
episodes.overview: An extended version of a 2008 episode, S6:E14, exploring the criminal case of Michelle Michael, featuring updated news and extra footage. Michael was accused of giving her husband a lethal injection and then setting fire to their West Virginia home in November 2005. (also shown as S8:E26)

episodes.name: Jill Rockcastle
episodes.overview: When a high-roller, and pro poker player, was found stabbed to death in his luxury Las Vegas apartment in April 2007, police suspected his missing wife held the key to his violent murder.

episodes.name: Denise Miller
episodes.overview: After a police officer's death is set up as suicide, investigators turn to the murdered man's girlfriend, only to discover that she has completely vanished.

episodes.name: Tracie Andrews
episodes.overview: A December 1996 case involves an aspiring model, her fiancé and, at first glance, an apparent road-rage attack. The British public got behind her when she sadly revealed how she witnessed her husband's murder, but did she?

episodes.name: Ann Marie Stout
episodes.overview: When a man is found shot to death in his Montana home in June 2007, police uncover a curious case of fatal attraction, as his wife points the blame at her husband's disgruntled ex-lover.

episodes.name: Rhonda Glover
episodes.overview: A former Texas rodeo queen faces a different kind of judge when she's accused of shooting her oilman ex-beau. Will the jury believe it was self defense?

episodes.name: Karen Tobie
episodes.overview: In June 2004, a plumber is shot dead on his doorstep. Investigators needn't search far for their culprits, uncovering a sinister plot.

episodes.name: Jane Andrews
episodes.overview: A former royal aide's regal fairy tale abruptly ended when her millionaire lover is found stabbed to death in September 2000. She is missing and police fear for her life - is she a victim too?

episodes.name: Diane Fleming
episodes.overview: After a husband dies in June 2000, his wife is accused of spiking his drink. The community divides into those who think his death was accidental and those who think he was deliberately poisoned.

episodes.name: Supersized: Elicia Hughes

episodes.name: Kim Long
episodes.overview: A vicious attack leaves a man dead and his girlfriend under suspicion, but is there enough evidence to prove murder?

episodes.name: Giselle Esteban
episodes.overview: A pretty, young nursing student disappears and the investigation uncovers a deadly feud with her former best friend.

episodes.name: Ghazal Mansury
episodes.overview: When a 79-year old woman goes missing, her daughter blames dementia but the rest of her family suspects someone much closer to home.

episodes.name: Dawn Fowler
episodes.overview: A church congregation is shocked when a deadly home invasion turns out to be part of a scandalous web of sex, lies and greed.

episodes.name: Notorious: Lyle and Erik Menendez, Part 1
episodes.overview: In this two part special, Snapped examines the notorious case of the Menendez brothers: their background, their crime and the stunning trials that made history. Part 1 of 2.

episodes.name: Notorious: Lyle and Erik Menendez, Part 2
episodes.overview: In this two part special, Snapped examines the notorious case of the Menendez brothers: their background, their crime and the stunning trials that made history. Part 2 of 2.

episodes.name: Loretta Burroughs
episodes.overview: The search for a missing man leads to a disturbing discovery years later deep in his wife's closet.

episodes.name: Donna Blanton
episodes.overview: The death of a state trooper leads to an all-out hunt for his killer, but the evidence points to his new wife and a big secret.

episodes.name: Diane Borchardt

episodes.name: Susan Walls
episodes.overview: A brutal death reveals a disturbing family secret and pits mother against daughter.

episodes.name: Chandaliea Lowder
episodes.overview: A mother's fury leads to a shooting in the woods, but who will the community side with?

episodes.name: Tanasha Siena

episodes.name: Deborah Huiett

episodes.name: Michele Donohue

episodes.name: Patricia MacCallum
episodes.overview: When a camper goes missing, the search uncovers problems in his marriage and a deadly plot.

episodes.name: Shayna Hubers

episodes.name: Shaunna Dodd
episodes.overview: A deadly home invasion leads to questions about a popular bartender, illegal drugs and the murder of her husband.

episodes.name: Michelle Bryom
episodes.overview: A shooting has investigators asking was it the work of a rebellious son, an abused wife or something far more sinister?

episodes.name: Donna Scrivo

episodes.name: Sarah McLinn
episodes.overview: A shocking murder raises questions about a young woman, her relationship with her boss and the possibility of multiple personalities.

episodes.name: Stacey Shoeck

episodes.name: Teresa Kotomski

episodes.name: Notorious: Scott Peterson

episodes.name: Lucille Duncan

episodes.name: Tina Williamson

episodes.name: Misook Wang

episodes.name: Whitney Harris

episodes.name: Diane Staudte

episodes.name: Lisa Graham
episodes.overview: In a shocking turn of events, a mother must face her demons when her daughter is left for dead after a vicious murder.

episodes.name: Rebecca Fenton
episodes.overview: A woman finds her husband dead and proclaims her innocence, but questions about his wealth, a suspicious fire and her scandalous past raise red flags.

episodes.name: Kwaneta Harris

episodes.name: Eve Nance

episodes.name: Martha Ann McClancy

episodes.name: Sandra Barajas

episodes.name: Notorious: Drew Peterson

episodes.name: Beatrice Camper

episodes.name: Notorious: Tupac Shakur

episodes.name: Sandy Locklear
episodes.overview: The murder of a beloved widower leaves police wondering what secrets his marriage, to his much younger new wife, might be hiding.

episodes.name: Michelle Paet
episodes.overview: An Air Force sergeant is gunned down in his garage revealing an elaborate conspiracy with an unlikely mastermind.

episodes.name: Laura Stelmasek
episodes.overview: Police must unravel a mystery involving an Arizona couple, cross-country romance and a deadly plan.

episodes.name: Dawson McGehee

episodes.name: Eric Copple

episodes.name: Barbara Garcia

episodes.name: Daniel Clay

episodes.name: Helen Moore

episodes.name: Danielle Parker

episodes.name: Emma Raine

episodes.name: Tameshia Shelton

episodes.name: Crystal Weimer

episodes.name: Shajia Ayobi
episodes.overview: Does a shocking carjacking have ties to international espionage? Or will the murderer turn out to be someone much closer to home?

episodes.name: Sonia Mitchell
episodes.overview: When a young father goes missing, authorities suspect his illegal activities, but a revelation about the mother of his children turns the investigation upside down.

episodes.name: Kimberly Ross
episodes.overview: A generous couple opens their home to help others, but a deadly home invasion raises questions about lies and conspiracy under their roof.

episodes.name: Shelly Arndt
episodes.overview: A deadly fire destroys a home and leaves one man dead, but investigators suspect the fire was an inside job.

episodes.name: Verginia Turner
episodes.overview: A possible love triangle has deadly consequences for a prominent California lawyer.

episodes.name: Melissa Napier
episodes.overview: When a determined son urges police to investigate the disappearance of his father, he is met with a storm of family tragedy and betrayal.

episodes.name: Joanna McElrath
episodes.overview: The investigation into the murder of a fellow officer plunges detectives into a cavern of secrets and lies.

episodes.name: Joyce Sturdivant

episodes.name: Notorious: Aileen Wournous
episodes.overview: An in depth look at the complexities of the case against the woman branded as America's first female serial killer. Questions still revolve around her claim of self-defense and whether or not she got the justice she deserved.

episodes.name: Margaret Litchfield
episodes.overview: When a popular construction man in a tight-knit Texas town is found gunned down in his own home, it takes police a decade and a half to track down the killer.

episodes.name: Wanda Stanley

episodes.name: Donna Thorngren

episodes.name: Amy Van Wagner

episodes.name: Eugenia Campbell

episodes.name: Martha Farmer

episodes.name: Dee Eggert

episodes.name: Cindy Reese

episodes.name: Janet Tyburski

episodes.name: Roxanne Buck

episodes.name: Neola Robinson

episodes.name: Diana Nadell
episodes.overview: An affluent grandmother falls victim to an elaborate murder plot fueled by passion and greed.

episodes.name: Notorious: Ted Bundy

episodes.name: Ashley Schutt
episodes.overview: When a woman covered in blood shows up on her neighbor's doorstep, Georgia police commence a home invasion investigation that leads them to uncover more twists than they could have ever imagined.

episodes.name: Susan Hendricks

episodes.name: Sharon Maxwell

episodes.name: Denise Frei
episodes.overview: The murder of a local café owner leads a small-town police force to uncover a diabolical scheme fueled by scandalous temptation.

episodes.name: Amy Fisher

episodes.name: Angela Ferguson

episodes.name: Notorious: The BTK Serial Killer
episodes.overview: Under the guise of the "BTK Killer," Rader heinously murdered 10 people, over the course of 17 years, all while taunting Wichita police and media before finally being brought to justice, after 30 years of cold cases. In an exclusively acquired interview, the "BTK Killer," which acronym stood for "bind," "torture," "kill" reveals his darkest secrets and what drove him to murder. The special features exclusive interviews with experts and the journalists that were tormented by him.

episodes.name: Angelina O'Mara

episodes.name: Jackie Ray

episodes.name: Diana Lovejoy

episodes.name: Teresa Rodgers

episodes.name: Kristen Westfall

episodes.name: Kisha Schaberg
episodes.overview: A family's life is turned upside down when a ghost from their past returns for revenge.

episodes.name: Hannah Stone
episodes.overview: When a devout single mother vanishes from her home, investigators fear she's been abducted by a group of teens hell-bent on a devilish plan; they race to find her before it's too late.

episodes.name: Kari Willoughby

episodes.name: Cindy McKay

episodes.name: Nanette Litherland
episodes.overview: When a household is targeted by gunfire twice in a short amount of time, investigators in rural Missouri sift through a community in search of a family's enemies, which leads them to a mastermind pulling strings.

episodes.name: Jasmine Harlee
episodes.overview: An investigation into the mysterious death of a loving mother leads authorities to uncover a diabolical plot hatched close to home.

episodes.name: Melissa Patterson

episodes.name: Theresa Voss

episodes.name: Judy Flanagan

episodes.name: Rebecca Braswell
episodes.overview: An investigation into the murder of a military hero tests the bonds of military camaraderie and unravels a myriad of secrets, lies and hidden identities.

episodes.name: Pamela Lanier
episodes.overview: A woman’s innocence is called into question after her husband dies from a mysterious malady and encourages detectives to take a deep dive into her past.

episodes.name: Georgia Watson
episodes.overview: When a man is ambushed by a firestorm of bullets outside his home, investigators follow a twisted trail of suspects to a vindictive mastermind.

episodes.name: Kathryn Briggs

episodes.name: Beverly McColm

episodes.name: Nancy Khan

episodes.name: Debra Dillard

episodes.name: Janice Dodson

episodes.name: Frances Truesdale

episodes.name: Deborah Perna

episodes.name: Cynthia Alvarez

episodes.name: William Dennis

episodes.name: Tyler Block-Patton

episodes.name: Valerie Nessler

episodes.name: Brandy Stutzman

episodes.name: Hazelynn Stomps

episodes.name: Hope Schreiner

episodes.name: Behind Bars: Sheila Davalloo
episodes.overview: The only convicted murderer featured on Snapped twice, Davalloo tells her story in an exclusive prison interview. We look back at the crimes that put her behind bars, reveal details from her past, and examine a possible connection to a cold case.

episodes.name: Jennifer Morrisey
episodes.overview: When a concerned co-worker discovers a man executed in his home in a well to do neighbourhood police are sent down a winding road of greed, drugs, and heartbreak to uncover a spiteful murderer.

episodes.name: Stephanie Olson

episodes.name: Angel Brown
episodes.overview: After a father’s life is tragically cut short in a car accident, the events that follow force Ohio investigators to race against the clock to prevent a murder-for-hire plot before it’s too late.

episodes.name: Mary Ann Hughes

episodes.name: Hilma Marie Witte
episodes.overview: Years after a beloved father is accidentally shot in his home, the family matriarch mysteriously vanishes. As a second investigation launches, a shocking confession reveals a family secret about how far a son is willing to go for his mother.

episodes.name: Megan Hargan
episodes.overview: (S31:E20) wasn't aired at this time as she is getting a new trial.  //  A frantic 911 call leads police to the bodies of Pam Hargan and her youngest adult daughter Helen Hargan in what appears to be a murder-suicide in the upscale neighborhood of McLean, VA. Investigators soon discover a trail of deceit that exposes an unexpected killer.

episodes.name: Aria Armstead
episodes.overview: When a 32-year-old man vanishes in Fort Meyers, FL, police quickly link an abandoned, blood-soaked vehicle to his case. Investigators use GPS to retrace his steps and must determine if this missing man is a victim or killer?

episodes.name: Kathryn Sinkevitch
episodes.overview: An Arizona man is shot to death in his garage before he’s able to read the results of a paternity test. Investigators follow a surveillance trail across town to uncover the twisted events that led up to his death.

episodes.name: Donna Arroyo
episodes.overview: When a loving father is gunned down in upstate New York, a hunt for the gunman ensues that crosses state lines. As several suspects are brought in, investigators must determine who’s telling the truth to finally reveal the ruthless mastermind.

episodes.name: Barbara Holder
episodes.overview: When a Texas woman discovers her husband’s brutally stabbed body in their ransacked home, police suspect he was the victim of a robbery gone wrong. As they dig deeper, a torrid love affair built on manipulation and greed is unveiled.

episodes.name: Georgina Misener
episodes.overview: After what appears to be a fatal road rage incident, authorities in Clifton, AZ, follow a trail of recovered text messages that suggest this was no random attack, but instead a cold-blooded murder.

episodes.name: Kimberly Bailey
episodes.overview: A prominent private investigator is reported missing after he fails to return from a business trip. When the case goes cold, a former Russian spy assists the FBI in a sting operation to uncover the truth behind his disappearance.

episodes.name: Martha Beatty
episodes.overview: Police believe that a dependable Florida man left town of his own volition when he fails to show up for work, but as years go by, town rumors lead police to unearth a gruesome crime.

episodes.name: Judith Nix
episodes.overview: After a loving father is found dead in the bedroom of his Oklahoma home by his ex-wife, Broken Arrow police must unpack a complex family dynamic and a loyalty based on greed in order to get answers.

episodes.name: Denice Smith
episodes.overview: Crosby, TN, is shocked when a beloved father and pastor is found dead outside a ransacked house; police question if this was a robbery gone wrong until an unexpected witness comes forward to reveal the disturbing truth.

episodes.name: Colleen Harris
episodes.overview: California police receive a bizarre 911 call from an attorney who informs them of a death but won't share more details; an eerie feeling of déjà vu covers the investigation when detectives learn the details of a 30-year-old case in the same home.

episodes.name: Connie Brown
episodes.overview: After the bloody slaying of two men in rural South Carolina, a witness comes forward with information implicating her own family, leaving police to uncover if blood really is thicker than water.

episodes.name: Priscilla Bradford
episodes.overview: When a prominent Florida optometrist is bludgeoned to death in his home, Melbourne police must investigate claims of self-defense; the evidence trail leads them to a young witness who reveals a wicked murder plot.

episodes.name: Lisa Boldridge
episodes.overview: When a father is found shot to death in his country home, the family immediately accuses the victim’s on-again/off-again ex-spouse. However, evidence soon suggests there might be more players to blame than simply a woman scorned.

episodes.name: Patricia McMillion
episodes.overview: After a welfare check is called in on a 53-year-old Texas man, police soon discover him shot to death in a Louisiana swamp that’s 450 miles from his home. Detectives devise a sting operation to track down his killer and reveal a vengeful murder plot.

episodes.name: Linda Leedom
episodes.overview: When a local EMT dies in a suspicious house fire in Mississippi, investigators work for two years to expose the mastermind behind her death and uncover a greedy scheme from an unlikely source.

episodes.name: Lynlee Renick
episodes.overview: When a renowned Missouri snake breeder is discovered in a pool of blood, investigators believe his death was caused by one of his snakes. However, shocking evidence is found on scene, launching a homicide investigation that unveils a sinister plot.

episodes.name: Falicia Blakely
episodes.overview: After three Atlanta men are gunned down in the span of three days, detectives connect the murders to two exotic dancers. Knowing only their stage names, investigators race to find the women and uncover the motive behind this devastating crime spree.

episodes.name: Candy Jo Webb
episodes.overview: After skeletal remains are uncovered at a makeshift dumpsite in Fort Sumner, NM, investigators are left to untangle a complicated family history that reveals the callous truth behind what happened.

episodes.name: Mary Louise Bowles
episodes.overview: When human remains are discovered by road workers in West Virginia, a decades-old missing person’s case is reopened and investigators are left to unravel an extensive history of scams and violence, leading them to a malicious con-woman.

episodes.name: Rosa Medina
episodes.overview: A family demands answers when the body of an Arizona woman is discovered in a remote area of Texas. Evidence left behind leads investigators to unravel a web of deceit until a shocking confession reveals the true mastermind

episodes.name: Lulu Sosa
episodes.overview: When Texas authorities learn of a murder-for-hire plot against an acclaimed boxer, they must devise an undercover sting operation and race against the clock to save his life and expose the remorseless mastermind.

episodes.name: Cheryl Lucero
episodes.overview: After a demolition derby driver is found gunned down in his California auto shop, police uncover a dangerous love match that led one woman to commit the ultimate crime.

episodes.name: Doris Carlson
episodes.overview: After responding to a frantic 911 call from a care-facility nurse who has discovered her patient with severe stab wounds and clinging to life, police receive an unexpected tip.

episodes.name: Tikisha Upshaw
episodes.overview: When a beloved father and driven entrepreneur is fatally shot at a busy California intersection, authorities discover a recent business venture that led one partnership to turn deadly.

episodes.name: Vanessa Cameron
episodes.overview: After the body of a young San Antonio man is found dumped in a local cemetery, investigators retrace the victim's steps to untangle a web of deceit that begins with a heartless woman.

episodes.name: Cathie Grigsby
episodes.overview: The coastal community of Sargent, Texas is thrown into shock when a beloved retiree is found executed in his home. As the investigation unfolds, an unlikely witness comes forward and leads investigators to uncover a malicious murder plot.

episodes.name: Sarah Andry
episodes.overview: Rumors spread through a small town in Indiana after a well-known resident is found dead in his home after hosting a party. Authorities investigate accusations from the partygoers to expose how a toxic love triangle turned deadly.

episodes.name: Kimmi Hardy
episodes.overview: When an Iowa mother and her newborn son are reported missing, police are in a race against time to rescue the pair and stop a maniacal woman from enacting a dangerous plan.

episodes.name: Michael Thomas
episodes.overview: When a loving father is shot to death in front of his home by a masked gunman on Halloween night, Los Angeles Police must follow the evidence to determine whether this was a case of holiday hijinks gone awry or something far more sinister.

episodes.name: Darryl Williams
episodes.overview: Halloween turns into a real-life horror movie when a single mother is gunned down on her way home from trick-or-treating by a costumed killer in Florida. Detectives uncover an unexpected witness that helps reveal the monster behind the mask.

episodes.name: Amber Burch
episodes.overview: When two men disappear in the quiet community of Clemmons, NC, rumors swirl about a devil-worshipping couple and their house of horrors. An investigation leads police to discover there may be more than secrets buried in the backyard.

episodes.name: Eric Christensen
episodes.overview: When a beloved woman goes missing in Everett, WA, police find that her apartment was the scene of a violent attack. Unable to find her, investigators are led to a coven of modern-day wiccans and one witness who reveals the horrifying truth.

episodes.name: Bryan Miller
episodes.overview: When two young women are brutally murdered in Phoenix, friends and family wait decades for answers. When advancements in DNA reinvigorate the case, police discover their killer has been hiding in plain sight.

episodes.name: Bryan Miller
episodes.overview: When two young women are brutally murdered in Phoenix, friends and family wait decades for answers. When advancements in DNA reinvigorate the case, police discover their killer has been hiding in plain sight.

episodes.name: Betty Wilson
episodes.overview: The unaired pilot that analyzes the investigation into the gruesome murder of an esteemed Southern doctor. An anonymous tip leads police to uncover a pattern of lust, greed and a complex dynamic between twin sisters.

episodes.name: Susan Polk
episodes.overview: Updates to an episode with new details and interviews. The son of a wealthy psychologist finds his father murdered and points the finger at his mother. Investigators delve into the marriage, revealing darkness hidden behind a façade.

episodes.name: Lisa Suter
episodes.overview: Missouri police are called to the home of a prominent judge’s daughter to find her husband dead on the couch. While the crime scene suggests a break-in, investigators uncover evidence of a scandalous murder plot driven by greed.

episodes.name: Betty Kirk
episodes.overview: When a beloved Florida mother is found brutally shot to death and her newborn missing, investigators race against the clock to track down a mysterious visitor whose motives prove sinister.

episodes.name: Joe Campbell
episodes.overview: Serenity in the Montana mountains is shattered when a man is shot to death on his neighbor’s land. Detectives learn of an escalating dispute over trail access and reenact the shooting to discover if claims of self-defense match the evidence.

episodes.name: Neal Zumberge
episodes.overview: A feud between neighbors in the quiet suburb of New Brighton, Minn., turns deadly when one man’s passion for local wildlife drives his neighbor to snap. Investigators must determine whether the shooter acted out of self-defense or bitter revenge.

episodes.name: Lennie Paul Tracey
episodes.overview: When an eight-year feud between neighbors in Santa Clarita, Calif., ends in a violent confrontation that leaves one man dead, detectives investigate if the shooting was a tragic case of mistaken identity or a calculated murder plot.

episodes.name: Kristie Evans
episodes.overview: A beloved pastor is fatally shot in his sleep by a mysterious intruder; investigators uncover a scandalous lifestyle and sordid family secrets that sends shock waves through a small Oklahoma community.

episodes.name: Valerie Rider
episodes.overview: When a young mother goes missing in rural Ohio, it's a race against time to uncover the truth behind her disappearance; as evidence begins pointing to foul play, investigators fear she may have been the victim of a toxic family dynamic.

episodes.name: Angela Wilty
episodes.overview: After a hardworking family man is gunned down in his driveway, a domestic dispute leads investigators to an unlikely culprit – and unravels a history of violence, lies and betrayal.

episodes.name: Sharon Hurt
episodes.overview: A look at the mindset of scorned woman Tonya Ford, who killed her police officer husband, David, when she discovered he was leaving her for another woman.

episodes.name: Johnetta Hall
episodes.overview: When a collector of racecar memorabilia is found shot in broad daylight in Scott County, Ind., with no eyewitnesses, detectives follow the evidence to reveal the true mastermind behind this twisted murder plot.

episodes.name: Rita Gluzman
episodes.overview: When an officer discovers a man dumping bags containing more than 60 body parts in the Passaic River in East Rutherford, New Jersey, investigators work to identify the victim and corroborate the chilling story of a confessed killer.

episodes.name: Kimberly Hancock
episodes.overview: A 15-year-old missing persons case is reinstated when an anonymous tipster leads police to unearth a grisly murder. As witnesses come forward, North Carolina investigators must try to piece together the crime and bring the killer to justice.

episodes.name: Jennifer Faith
episodes.overview: A hardworking family man is shot to death in front of his wife during a morning walk with their dog. As police determine if the attack was random or targeted, they uncover a web of deceit spanning across state lines.

episodes.name: 20 Year Anniversary: Sharee Miller
episodes.overview: 20 years in the making, this special reexamines the Internet's first murder trial, revealing a twisted seductress with a skill for manipulation. After time in prison, she has a second chance at life and love with a stunning final update in her case.

episodes.name: Theresa Cox
episodes.overview: When a young Missouri couple are found shot to death on their front porch, the victims’ past quickly reveals several suspects close to home. Investigators press for a confession from one of the co-conspirators to expose a master manipulator.

episodes.name: Shelia Keen Warren
episodes.overview: A beloved mother is fatally shot on her Florida doorstep by someone disguised as a clown. Due to the mysteriously dressed culprit, decades pass before investigators can utilize advancing technology to reveal the killer and salacious motive.

episodes.name: Reta Mays
episodes.overview: At a VA hospital in West Virginia a string of severe hypoglycemic events results in the deaths of several patients. After an investigation ensues, a deadly pattern reveals the work of a serial killer lurking within the halls of the hospital.

episodes.name: Martie Soderberg
episodes.overview: A local Washington man's life is at stake when detectives are alerted to a murder-for-hire plot against him. To act quickly, they set up a sting operation to catch the ruthless mastermind before it is too late.

episodes.name: Katrina Fouts
episodes.overview: After a member of the Indiana cycling community is found mysteriously murdered, medical examiners discover the victim ingested potentially lethal amounts of poisonous mushrooms. Police must work to uncover the culprit behind this bizarre crime.

episodes.name: Catherine Pileggi
episodes.overview: When Fort Lauderdale, FL, police respond to reports of a deceased male, Ron Vinci, who fell down the stairs, their investigation turns to a homicide case; with multiple witnesses and an attorney on scene, investigators must dig deep to get to the truth.

episodes.name: Lillie Mae Eubank
episodes.overview: After returning from several tours of duty abroad, a soldier is found beaten to death on his own army base in Hinesville, Georgia. Investigators soon discover the greatest danger may have been waiting for him closer to home.

episodes.name: Nicole Thornhill
episodes.overview: A Stuart, FL, woman’s desperate search for her missing husband takes a dark turn when his mutilated body is found in a landfill. As detectives dig into his home life, the victim’s family becomes a crucial link to uncovering the grisly truth.

episodes.name: Kelsey Turner
episodes.overview: Beloved child psychiatrist Tom Burchard is found murdered and left in the trunk of a car in the Nevada desert. As the strange case unfolds, police discover he may have been the victim of a model aiming to maintain her lavish lifestyle.

episodes.name: Olga Vasquez-Collazos
episodes.overview: A Peruvian healthcare worker gets a second chance at love until he’s found murdered in his Westminster, CA, apartment. Investigators set out to discover whether his new bride is a grieving widow or a femme fatale.

episodes.name: Sydney Powell
episodes.overview: A beloved health care worker is viciously attacked in her home with only her daughter as a witness. Police must follow the disturbing clues at the scene to discover the truth behind this heinous attack that leaves a family shattered.

episodes.name: Barbara Pasa
episodes.overview: In May 2018, firefighters are called to the scene of a Centerville, IA, family's home to find the residence up in flames; as the smoke clears, they discover the charred remains of Tim Pasa and question whether the fire and his death were truly accidental.

episodes.name: Sasha Skare
episodes.overview: The 2021 fatal shooting of a well-known San Antonio rapper, 34-year-old Air Force veteran Martell DeRouen aka Kardone, puts the community on high alert; as they piece together the evidence, witnesses point the finger at a scorned lover fueled by rage.

episodes.name: Viktoriya Nasyrova
episodes.overview: In this two-hour special, 35-year-old Olga Tsvyk, an immigrant pursuing her dreams, is found drugged in her home. Across New York, another person with similar symptoms comes forward, and authorities connect the cases, exposing an international fugitive with a ruthless pattern.

episodes.name: Debra Taylor
episodes.overview: When family man and National Guardsman Roy Taylor is shot to death in his home in 1988, his widow, Debra, is quick to point the blame around town. As Little Rock, AR, detectives tail the suspects, a torrid affair and deadly secret come to light, revealing a manipulative wolf in sheep's clothing.

episodes.name: Tonica Jenkins
episodes.overview: Melissa Latham, a frantic East Cleveland, OH, woman, seeks refuge in a fast-food restaurant after escaping from a deadly assault. Police will sort through contradicting stories to expose a habitual criminal that will stop at nothing to avoid conviction.

episodes.name: Felicia Barden
episodes.overview: When fireman Willie Barden, a devoted husband and father, is found shot to death on his bathroom floor in 2019, the case is quickly ruled a homicide. As a key witness starts changing their story, detectives in Olive Branch, MS, must determine if this was an act of self-defense or premeditated murder.

episodes.name: Carole Gold
episodes.overview: When Charles 'Chuck' Gold, a Wild West reenactor, is found murdered in his private Arizona ranch by his wife Carole, Phoenix police race to find the killer of the beloved showman. As investigators connect the dots, they realize the cold-blooded mastermind is lurking close to home.

episodes.name: Mary Lee Orsini
episodes.overview: When Alice McArthur, wife of high-profile criminal defense attorney Bill McArthur, is found shot dead in their Little Rock, AR home in 1982, police theorize if a disgruntled client of Bill's could be to blame. The investigation will expose an obsessive admirer with a delusional motive to murder.

episodes.name: Cathleen Roth
episodes.overview: After a routine welfare check, Albuquerque police discover 61-year-old beloved schoolteacher Ellen Roth has vanished. As investigators dive into her family history, they uncover a shocking murder plot driven by vengeance and jealousy.

episodes.name: Roberta Samard
episodes.overview: After Roberta Samard, a Millersburg, OR wife, claims she accidentally shot and killed her husband, Ken, while attempting to commit suicide in 2016, the cracks in a seemingly perfect marriage are brought to light. The investigation will uncover if his inadvertent death was truly an accident or a deadly cover-up.

episodes.name: Joyce Pelzer
episodes.overview: A Conyers, GA woman, Rosalyn 'Roz' Lewis, who is brutally stabbed 34 times, provides police with a suspect's name, her wife Joyce Pelzer, before succumbing to her injuries. As the manhunt for the killer begins, a pattern of toxicity will expose a violent past and more than one murder.

episodes.name: Kimberly Williams
episodes.overview: The tragic suicide of a beloved grandfather seems to be an open-and-shut case until detectives in Morrisdale, Pa., receive a message from beyond the grave that suggests the deceased may not have died by his own hand.

episodes.name: Danelle Geier
episodes.overview: When a former Penn State professor mysteriously goes missing, police uncover clues to his untimely demise; the investigation leads to a grisly crime scene and two unlikely culprits, who would stop at nothing to get rid of him.
